Allow to open directories directly by @aitor-gomila in link
Commit Description: Add inode/directory MIME type to desktop file Fix typo in desktop file Experimental code that allows to open folders. Needs feedback Use continue instead of return not to stop loop Use File[] instead of Array Implement changes in review, improve readibility Make loop code easier to understand and more performant Implement changes in review Use try/catch to handle errors in list_directory Get files from subdirectories too Lint Make field private Simplify code calling is_directory Move is_directory declaration to inline Move rest of the try/catch outside Declare dir outside in try/catch Co-authored-by: Leo lenemter@gmail.com Give flatpak access to users Music folder Ignore flatpack files Comment and debugging message Remove unneeded linebreak Use type inference in File declaration at list_directory Co-authored-by: Leo lenemter@gmail.com Co-authored-by: Jeremy Wootten jeremy@elementaryos.org
